entry.page: # Improving # Weapons I have discovered lapis lazuli focuses the energy of the blue anomalies, which I call Azuras. Now that I have samples of Azuras in the form of Flawed Azurane I can investigate uses. It seems to have an affinity for offense, I've designed a simple charm to increase the damage done by any weapon. Applying the charm requires only the weapon and Flawed Azurane.
